mact_desc: kmeasure_desc
Non-0 COUNT or [Jump in the] RATE of Network Policy config update
Non-0 COUNT or [Jump in the] RATE of ConfigMap config update
Non-0 COUNT or [Jump in the] RATE of Cluster Role definition, binding updates, focusing on "get secrets", "list secrets", "create pods/exec cluster" permissions
Non-0 COUNT or [Jump in the] RATE of RBAC config and resource updates  (e.g. cluster role binding creation)
[Jitter in the] AGGR(IRATE of network package + bytes received,  transmitted, dropped) i.e. connectivity halt across kube-system namespace via cAdvisor
[Jitter in the] AGGR(IRATE of http request, client rest request) i.e. connectivity halt across kube-system namespace via kubelet-metrics
[Jump in the] AGGR(RATE  of http request, client rest request durations) i.e. latency across kube-system namespace via kubelet-metrics
[Jump in the] AGGR(RATE of received/transmitted package drops) i.e. latency across kube-system namespace via cAdvisor
[Jump in the] RATE of access for impersonated users/source IPs
Non-0 COUNT of POD create event with image from other/blacklisted registry
[Jump in the] RATE of service account or IP address creating pods, mounting hosts under preconfigured namespaces (i.e. kube-system, default),
[Jump in the] RATE of access to exposed Apache NiFi, Kubeflow, Argo Workflows, Weave Scope, and the Kubernetes dashboard
[Jump in the] RATE of pod/exec endpoint requests for impersonated users/source IPs

Non-0 COUNT or [Jump in the] RATE of standalone (non-controller driven) POD creation
